1.name: The Silence of the Lambs
1.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

2.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
2.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

3.name: Thelma & Louise
3.description: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

4.name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
4.description: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

5.name: Hook
5.description: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

6.name: Boyz n the Hood
6.description: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence and future prospects.

7.name: Point Break
7.description: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

8.name: The Rocketeer
8.description: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high-flying masked hero.

9.name: Beauty and the Beast
9.description: A Prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

10.name: Father of the Bride
10.description: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

11.name: My Own Private Idaho
11.description: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

12.name: Cape Fear
12.description: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

13.name: Rambling Rose
13.description: A young woman who exudes sexuality battles temptation.

14.name: The Addams Family
14.description: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

15.name: My Girl
15.description: A young girl, on the threshold of her teen years, finds her life turning upside down, when she is accompanied by an unlikely friend.

16.name: Omohide poro poro
16.description: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

17.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
17.description: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.

18.name: JFK
18.description: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

19.name: Fried Green Tomatoes
19.description: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

20.name: Career Opportunities
20.description: Jim is the dorky son of a local cement contractor who lives at home and has no direction. Josie is the gorgeous daughter of a wealthy businessman who dreams of leaving town. They find they have a lot in common.

21.name: The Last Boy Scout
21.description: A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

22.name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
22.description: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

23.name: Toy Soldiers
23.description: A group of troublemaking boys decide to take a stand when terrorists seize control of their boarding school.

24.name: Bugsy
24.description: The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.

25.name: The Doors
25.description: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

26.name: Hot Shots!
26.description: A parody of Top Gun (1986) in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

27.name: Backdraft
27.description: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

28.name: Barton Fink
28.description: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

29.name: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear
29.description: Lieutenant Frank Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

30.name: The Fisher King
30.description: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

31.name: Sleeping with the Enemy
31.description: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

32.name: Drop Dead Fred
32.description: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

33.name: Naked Lunch
33.description: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally kills his wife, and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

34.name: Nothing But Trouble
34.description: A businessman and his friends are captured by a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion.

35.name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
35.description: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.

36.name: City Slickers
36.description: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

37.name: What About Bob?
37.description: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

38.name: Delicatessen
38.description: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

39.name: Return to the Blue Lagoon
39.description: In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.

40.name: Yuk po tuen: Tau ching bo gam
40.description: A man marries a beautiful wife, but decides to go out and experience as many sexual conquests as possible, with unusual and often hilarious results. Meanwhile, his wife is forced to enter a brothel and work as a prostitute.

41.name: Oscar
41.description: A gangster attempts to keep the promise he made to his dying father: that he would give up his life of crime and "go straight".

42.name: The Man in the Moon
42.description: A coming of age story set in the south of the U.S. when Elvis was King.

43.name: The People Under the Stairs
43.description: Two adults and a juvenile break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children. There, they must fight for their lives.

44.name: New Jack City
44.description: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

45.name: The Prince of Tides
45.description: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

46.name: Curly Sue
46.description: A homeless man and his young companion, who survive by conning people, meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.

47.name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
47.description: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

48.name: White Fang
48.description: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

49.name: Double Impact
49.description: Twin brothers are separated when their parents are murdered but 25 years later they re-unite in order to avenge their parents' death.

50.name: La belle noiseuse
50.description: The former famous painter Frenhofer revisits an abandoned project using the girlfriend of a young visiting artist. Questions about truth, life, and artistic limits are explored.
